definition: a map designed to assist navigation by air or sea, to plan in detail
details:
noun
- a map designed to assist navigation by air or sea
- a visual display of information
verb
- to plan in detail
= example: to plan in detail
- to make a chart of
= example: to make a chart of
- to represent by means of a graph
= example: to represent by means of a graph
= synonyms: graph
